body:
@carlosantoniodasilva this looks nice to me from a quick look.

btw I'd really like it if multi param attributes were implemented as e.g.

```
post[published_at][year]=2012&post[published_at][month]=8&post[published_at][day]=12
```

That would mean we'd only have to implement `#published_at=` to make it work.

It'd be cool if you were up for investigating that, but if so do get some opinions from other core people about whether it's a good idea.

@steveklabnik I'm not sure that there is consensus to extract composed of even to a plugin at the moment. I spent some time thinking about it the other day and kinda concluded that I think it's a useful feature with a crappy API and a bad implementation...
